revised_title: Vibrational Band Intensities and Structural Factors in Benzonitriles, Anilines, and Phenols
tldr: The authors studied the effect of ring substituents on the frequencies and intensities of vibrations in functional groups attached to aromatic rings, focusing on benzonitriles, anilines, and phenols. They found a linear relationship between band intensity and Hammett factor of substituents, and analyzed the inductive and resonance effects of different groups. The results provide more data for understanding the influence of solvent medium on absorbing solute molecules.
